items.summary: Modify the backend canister (Canister ID: tcbtk-yyaaa-aaaaa-qfanq-cai) to prevent trapping with "heap out of bounds" when calling the query method getAllSurgeryCases by making the retrieval memory-safe (e.g., by adding a bounded/paginated retrieval API and/or limiting allocations during sorting), while preserving existing access control behavior.

Update the frontend sync flow to avoid relying on unbounded getAllSurgeryCases calls (currently used in frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts) by using the new bounded/paginated backend retrieval method(s) and/or using incremental retrieval (e.g., getUpdatedCases) so that sync works even when the user has many cases.

Improve frontend error handling for backend trap/rejection errors during sync so the user sees a clear English message instead of the raw replica rejection details, while still logging the raw error to the console for debugging.
